name: Keyboard Dancer
description:
Controls

WASD - to move, at least initially, your controls will change over time! Indicated by a display in game.  The game's controls will be on constant display in the bottom left.

Description 

You are a little slime, who's trapped in a dangerous chamber of traps! Survive as long as you can!  However, there's a problem. the slime has short term memory loss and will forget how he is supposed to move frequently! 

This gets worse over time, and it'll become harder and harder to dodge! The camera might throw you off too! It gets more out of control as the game goes on! Stay alive!

Comment your highest score and what control scheme you died on!  Hope you enjoy!

If you enjoy what you see perhaps you should check out my other content!

My Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOQ2B7bDMlfs7ObFR1SvX4g

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/gerudum
